long_description: The Exped Synmat UL 7 air pad provides refuge from the cold, hard ground. It features an ultra lightweight design and packs down to the size of a half-liter water bottle. Lofted microfiber insulation is laminated to the top and bottom of the inner walls, providing efficient 4-season warmth. Baffled chambers evenly distribute insulation, eliminating cold spots. Mat can be inflated by mouth; features 2 wide, low-profile, FlatValves for inflation and deflation. Intake valve features a built-in flap to prevent air escaping when inflating; flap can be released to let a little air out when seeking out that ideal comfort zone. Polyester fabric is UV- and abrasion-resistant; non-slip finish helps keep you on the pad. Welded seams create airtight construction. The Exped Synmat UL 7 air pad comes with its own stuff sack for protection during transportation. Also includes repair kit with adhesive and fabric patches.
short_description: The Exped Synmat UL 7 air pad provides refuge from the cold, hard ground. It features an ultra lightweight design and packs down to the size of a half-liter water bottle.
